Class TaskExecutor

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
com.EnderLite.DataController.TaskExecutor

public class TaskExecutor extends Thread

      Sets pending list that will be checked
      Parameters:
      queue - pending messages queue

    • setInterval

      public void setInterval(long interval)
      Sets interval after which TaskExecutor wakes up and check queue. After checking and responding to queue chenges TaskExecutor sleeps for time given in interval.
      Parameters:
      interval - amaount of time in miliseconds

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Information for TaskExecutor to end infinite loop

    • run

      public void run()
      Wakes up after given interval, check queue and respond to message changes. After that goes to sleep again. Interrupt or use shutdown() to end infinite loop.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread
